cause.description:
Get the HPV (Human Papilloma Virus) vaccine today, and be one less. Tell your moms, sisters, cousins, and your best friends. Spread HPV awareness for women everywhere and insure that all girls and women will be One Less. Talk to your family doctor about getting the HPV shot today.
- Within one year of contracting HPV, cervival cancer and/or lessions may develop.
-It is estimated that the highest rate of women with HPV are 25 or less years of age.
-
1. Get vaccinated and be One Less.
2. Spread HPV awareness to all women.
3. Be a role model to young girls.
cause.mission: Spread the word, Not the disease.
cause.name: ONE LESS
